lead_paragraph: Ms. Wilsey is expected to stay on the board; the change follows a settlement the board struck with the former chief financial officer over her termination.

headline.print_headline: A Museum Shake-Up in San Francisco
headline.main: Powerful Board President Dede Wilsey Leaving Top Spot at Fine Arts Museums

snippet: Ms. Wilsey is expected to stay on the board; the change follows a settlement the board struck with the former chief financial officer over her termination....
abstract: Diane Wilsey will step down as chief executive of Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco as part of $2 million settlement with chief financial officer Michele Gutierrez to prevent wrongful-termination lawsuit; Fine Arts Group director Max Hollein will assume position.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco
